topics.body:
He just texted me, asking why I asked him if he was okay. Oh boy. He really, _really_ doesn't know.

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ae7eb363687207bd000033#post_55ae7eb363687207bd000033

That's what I'm trying to do. That's really all I _can_ do.

My advice? Take some time to clear your head. And cry as much as you want.

topics.body:
My friend just proposed a horrifying idea. Maybe he's texting us normally because he doesn't want us to be sad. Which would mean that he's bottling again. It's not really a thing to text about, but if he truly doesn't know, I don't want to call his phone and tell him the news inadvertently. 


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ae7f6a6368727bfe00019f#post_55ae7f6a6368727bfe00019f

Oh, trust me, the tears are a-coming.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ae801b6368721a31000126#post_55ae801b6368721a31000126
Okay I'm gonna be a sage again. A lot of men are REALLY bad at handling their emotions. They either keep them inside for too long or they let their emotions consume them. He's gonna need you now more than ever. You need to a fixed point for him. Something he can count on for the next few months.
topics.author: 4fde4618945b700aa0002fff

topics.body: Ugh i cannot figure out a fucking way to hide your messages
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ae801b6368721a31000126#post_55ae801b6368721a31000126

From experience. He's gonna have to face this sooner rather than later and look for every option available. Part time jobs, the expenses of the funeral, fixing the documentation of his dad.

No one likes losing a loved one but it's something that will happen, even with everyone here at some point.

He's going to need to vent and get a lot of stuff out of his head for the next weeks or months even. That's where family and friends come.

Everyone needs to support each other. My condolences
